dimensions.label: Artistic Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create art that is deeply personal and immersive, using a wide range of materials to convey emotions.
Your FarTwin will create art that is more conceptual and less visually representational, exploring ideas and concepts rather than physical forms.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach learning with a analytical mindset, breaking down complex concepts into smaller parts to understand them.
Your FarTwin will approach learning with a holistic mindset, looking for connections between seemingly unrelated ideas and seeking a broader understanding.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle group situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge in group situations, leading the conversation and asserting their opinions.
Your FarTwin will work collaboratively with others, listening to different perspectives and finding common ground.

dimensions.label: Technical Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn technical skills through hands-on experience, experimenting and tinkering with different tools and software.
Your FarTwin will approach technology from a theoretical perspective, studying the underlying principles and concepts rather than practical application.

dimensions.label: Leadership Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin lead others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will lead with authority and confidence, making tough decisions and setting clear expectations.
Your FarTwin will lead by collaboration and consensus-building, working to find common ground and shared goals.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be flexible with their schedule, adapting to changing circumstances and priorities.
Your FarTwin will approach time management in a structured and methodical way, breaking tasks into smaller steps and following a routine.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their emotions, sharing feelings and thoughts with others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions more reserved, only sharing them with those they trust or feel strongly about.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a global perspective on issues, considering the impact on different cultures and communities.
Your FarTwin will prioritize domestic concerns and focus on solving problems within their own country or region.
